amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to ensure election integrity by requiring a valid government-issued photographic ID for voting in federal elections.

vote.text: Amendment SA 526 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 54. Record Vote Number: 83.

action.text: Amendment SA 526 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Vitter.
